Package me.yleoft.zAPI.managers

Class LanguageManager

java.lang.Object
me.yleoft.zAPI.managers.LanguageManager
public class LanguageManager extends Object
LanguageManager class to manage language files. It provides methods to load and manage language files.

      folder - The folder where the language files are located.
      languageCode - The language code to use.
      fallbackLanguageCode - The fallback language code to use.
      Throws:
